docs.title: 🧠 Biomechanics UdeA
docs.text:
This website hosts the educational material for:

  • Human Biomechanics
  • Computational Biomechanics
  • Student research groups and gait lab projects

Here you will find laboratory guides, open-source software tutorials, OpenSim models, and anonymized datasets used for teaching and research.

docs.title: 🔧 Areas of Work
docs.text:
• :material-walk: Gait Laboratory Motion capture, force measurement, anthropometry, and instrumentation basics. Includes student-friendly guides and step-by-step procedures.

  • :material-brain: Modeling & Simulation Musculoskeletal modeling with OpenSim, kinematic and dynamic analyses, gait simulation.

  • :material-cogs: Design & Prototyping CAD models, STL files for orthotics and prosthetics, printable components, and examples.

docs.title: 👩🏽‍🏫 Instructor
docs.text: Juliana Uribe Pérez Biomedical Engineering Program — University of Antioquia
